tool_description: An API showing all the latest AI Filmmaking News around the world
name: AI Filmmaking Live
title: AI Filmmaking Live

api_list.name: Get individual New Source News
api_list.description: Get News about AI Filmmaking from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-filmmaking-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/techcrunch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-filmmaking-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-filmmaking-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-filmmaking-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all AI Filmmaking News
api_list.description: This end point will return back all news about AI Filmmaking from all over the world
